marklogic.body:
Jasper... good post. You are Spot on about liberals' inability to separate character from actions. But it is more apt to say that liberals are incapable of separating character from color, gender, race... whatever identity they put on their protected lists.
You may, however, want to re work you thoughts on what Jesus judged. With God it's about motive. He is concerned about how the heart functions in the here and now precisely so that we will not be judged unto condemnation in the future. Because from the heart, actions Always follow, God looks at the heart first.
